thread.title: Suffragettes inspire women's new battles 100 years on

title: Suffragettes inspire women's new battles 100 years on
text:
Suffragettes inspire women's new battles 100 years on 4:24pm GMT - 01:47 
100 years after gaining the right to vote in Britain thanks to the suffragettes' activism, women's revolt against sexual discrimination continues. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
